attributes.title: I thought this was for trump
attributes.review: This app only allows you to bulk order Cheetos, no president in sight.

attributes.title: migraines
attributes.review: I have never had a worse migraine after downloading an app. Needed advil👿👿👿👿

attributes.title: Just dumb
attributes.review: How is someone like him allowed to be the president or even create an app. Let’s cancel Trump 2020.

attributes.title: Gen z
attributes.review: Took five days to down load and after it wiped my intire phone it SUCKED

attributes.title: Who?
attributes.review: I don’t know who this guy is but he seems kinda stupid.

attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP!!!😡✨
attributes.review: my mom climbed on the roof n jumped off bc of a glitch in this app that told her it would make her happy. this app so sick🤬

attributes.title: 💞✨stranger✨💞
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with high expectations, but all I see is orange 🍊... my eyes hurt 😔😔😔 0/10 don’t get it

attributes.title: oh my god, do not use this app!
attributes.review: guys, the minute you download this, it gives you herpes 😱 i think it’s herpes from the president himself. they’re untreatable unless you leave a 1 star review, hopefully i’m cured 😖 also i hate it here
